answerText: Hard Times[10] Louisa marries this banker and has a loveless marriage before she falls for James Harthouse. This character's boasts about being a self-made man turn out to be untrue as Mrs. Pegler is actually his mother.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Lawrence U and Georgia Tech | 7 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: It is due to Mrs. Sparsit, who attempts to regain her employee's confidence, that Mrs. Pegler is found, while Louisa finds a man trapped in a mineshaft near the end of the work. FTPE:   [10] Name this Charles Dickens novel which sees Tom Gradgrind escape England after committing a crime initially blamed on Stephen Blackpool.
